episodes.title: Hi o mo Yaki Tsukusu Chikara: Akainu Hijou no Tsuigeki
episodes.plot: Whitebeard aims to take down the whole of Marineford and orders his crew and the other pirates to flee.

episodes.title: Kotae o Sagashite: Hiken Ace Senjou ni Shisu
episodes.plot: An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together.

episodes.title: Kaigun Honbu Houkai! Shirohige Kotobanaki Ikari!
episodes.plot: Luffy's has a breakdown due to the emotional trauma of Ace's death, causing Jinbe to take him away.

episodes.title: Kejime o Tsukeru: Shirohige vs Kurohige Kaizokudan
episodes.plot: Blackbeard and his pirates arrive in Marineford, as they are taken down from the execution platform by Whitebeard.

episodes.title: Show no Kaimaku: Akasareta Kurohige no Takurami
episodes.plot: The news of Whitebeard's death is already spreading all over the world. Silvers Rayleigh also hears the news.

episodes.title: Akainu no Shuunen! Luffy o Osou Magma no Kobushi
episodes.plot: Blackbeard expresses his desire to sink Marineford into the ocean after destroying the fortress, but Sengoku attacks him, saying that the island is a symbol of justice in the world.

episodes.title: Hisshi no Sakebi: Unmei o Kaeru Yuuki Aru Suubyou
episodes.plot: The fight in Marineford still rages on, as Trafalgar Law arrives to rescue Luffy.

episodes.title: Shanks Kenzan! Choujou Sensou Tsui ni Shuuketsu
episodes.plot: Law and his crew take Jinbe and Luffy inside their submarine.

episodes.title: Gun'yuu Kakkyo Su! "Atarashii Jidai" no Hajimari!
episodes.plot: As Luffy's fate hangs in the balance, word spreads that the war is over and people all over the world rejoice on the news of the Marines' victory.

episodes.title: Nyougashima Jouriku: Luffy o Semeru Kakoku na Genjitsu
episodes.plot: Brownbeard was seen taking over Foodvalten saying it was not a Whitebeard territory anymore, Iva said goodbye to Jinbe and the others.

episodes.title: Saikyou Tag! Funtou, Luffy to Toriko!
episodes.plot: After eating the Hungrila Bird that they captured, Luffy and Toriko team up again to save Nami and Komatsu who have been kidnapped by the Cocoalas.

episodes.title: Luffy to Ace: Kyoudai no Deai no Monogatari!
episodes.plot: Garp drops Luffy to live with the Dadan Family where he meets Ace - who immediately dislikes Luffy.

episodes.title: Sabo Toujou! Gray Terminal no Shounen
episodes.plot: Luffy discovers the end of the forest is a slum dumpster named Gray Terminal, a lawless area full of homeless people searching for valuables thrown out by the town's people.

episodes.title: Ore wa Nigenai: Ace Kesshi no Kyuushutsu Sakusen
episodes.plot: Ace and Sabo rescue Luffy from Porchemy by defeating him.

episodes.title: Itsuka Umi e! Sannin no Akudou Chikai no Sakazuki!
episodes.plot: Sabo is seen by his father but Sabo pretends to not know him.

episodes.title: Dadan Ikka to no Wakare!? Kansei! Himitsu Kichi
episodes.plot: Luffy, Ace and Sabo were going about their usual mischief until Garp turned up, and attacked them for still wanting to be pirates.

episodes.title: Luffy Deshiiri!? Kaizoku Ou to Tatakatta Otoko!
episodes.plot: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy chase down a Danpa and succeeds to catch it, but a tiger steals it.

episodes.title: Ootora to no Kessen! Senchou ni Naru no wa Dare Da!
episodes.plot: Ace, Sabo and Luffy help Naguri make a pirate ship.

episodes.title: Ubawareta Jiyuu! Sankyoudai ni Semaru Kizoku no Wana
episodes.plot: Sabo, Luffy and Ace are caught by the Bluejam Pirates.

episodes.title: Hanatareta Honoo: Gray Terminal no Kiki
episodes.plot: Sabo is being chased by his father's men.

episodes.title: Jiyuu wa Doko ni Aru? Shounen no Kanashiki Funade
episodes.plot: While Dadan and Ace stay behind to fight Bluejam, the rest of the Dadan Family and Luffy make a quick escape.

episodes.title: Yoroshiku Tanomu! Kyoudai kara Todoita Tegami!
episodes.plot: Sabo's ship is destroyed by a World Noble.

episodes.title: Yakusoku o Hatasu Tame: Sorezore no Tabidachi!
episodes.plot: After the death of Sabo, Ace and Luffy continue their training while the others discover the Revolutionaries' ship.

episodes.title: Aitsura ni Aitee! Luffy Namida no Sakebi
episodes.plot: Luffy still distraught at the death of Ace, blames it on his weakness.

episodes.title: Mugiwara no Ichimi Gekishin! Motarasareta Kyouhou
episodes.plot: On Kuraigana Island, Zoro confronts several Humandrills and is nearly defeated, but then Mihawk appears and scares them away.

episodes.title: Meiou Rayleigh to no Saikai: Luffy Ketsudan no Toki
episodes.plot: On Maiden Island, Rayleigh kills a Sea King and arrives on the island in front of Law's crew.

episodes.title: Senchou no Moto e: Sorajima no Datsugoku to Fuyujima no Jiken
episodes.plot: At Amazon Lily, Luffy tries to make up his mind regarding Rayleigh's offer, as he made a promise to his crew to meet in three days.

episodes.title: Sesshoku! Daikengou Mihawk: Zoro Iji no Shitou
episodes.plot: Zoro tried to go back to the sea using the small boat given to him by Mihawk but he could not get past the humandrills.

episodes.title: Sanji no Junan: Oukoku e to Kikan Shita Joou!
episodes.plot: Chopper leaves the Torino Kingdom, while riding one of the birds, hoping to be able to aid Luffy.

episodes.title: Masaka no Saijouriku! Luffy Marineford e!
episodes.plot: The Marine Headquarters have started rebuilding, and the Marines had a meeting about Monkey D. Luffy.

episodes.title: Nakama ni Todoke: Kakemeguru Dai News!
episodes.plot: Some of Luffy's old friends from Impel Down and around the world read the news about Luffy's second appearance at Marineford.

episodes.title: Ugokidasu Kaizoku-tachi! Kyoutendouchi no Shinsekai
episodes.plot: Trafalgar Law and his crew talk about going to the New World.

episodes.title: Jigoku o Ikinuke: Sanji Otoko o Kaketa Shoubu
episodes.plot: Nami tricks the old men into letting her stay on Weatheria. Franky stumbles upon Vegapunk's hidden laboratory and finds more blueprints and decides to study them.

episodes.title: Madamada Tsuyoku Naru! Zoro Senchou e no Chikai
episodes.plot: While being put on display in a cage, Brook feels appreciative towards all that Luffy had done for him and decides that he will move on and continue to aid Luffy.

episodes.title: Luffy Shugyou Kaishi: 2-nengo ni Yakusoku no Basho de
episodes.plot: Jinbe leaves Luffy with Rayleigh. Rayleigh takes Luffy to an abandoned island to begin his training. Rayleigh introduces Luffy to the concept of Haki and then demonstrates the three different types of Haki.

episodes.title: Shinshou Kaimaku: Saishuuketsu! Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: After two years of being separated, the Straw Hats return to Sabaody Archipelago.

episodes.title: Isshokusokuhatsu! Luffy Tai Nise Luffy
episodes.plot: Fake Luffy and the real Luffy come face-to-face, though the imposter is quickly beaten thanks to Luffy's use of Haki.

episodes.title: Kaigun Shutsudou: Nerawareta Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: Robin visits the Thousand Sunny and meets Franky there. Chopper goes to the Fake Straw Hat Pirates, mistaking them for his own crew.

episodes.title: Oomono Shuuketsu: Nise Mugiwara Ichimi no Kyoui
episodes.plot: Brook finishes his concert when the Marines arrive to capture him, but he escapes.

episodes.title: Sentou Kaishi! Misero Shugyou no Seika!
episodes.plot: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas.

episodes.title: Zen'in Shuugou: Luffy Shinsekai e no Funade
episodes.plot: Luffy along with Zoro and Sanji are heading to Grove #42.

episodes.title: Kyougaku no Shinjitsu: Sunny-gou o Mamotta Otoko
episodes.plot: Caribou is seen punishing the Fake Straw Hats for making him join them instead of the real Straw Hat Pirates.

episodes.title: Kaichuu no Shitou: Arawareta Oounabara no Akuma
episodes.plot: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hats. While Caribou manages to get on the Thousand Sunny, the rest of his crew gets pulled away by Mohmoo, who gets frightened when he recognizes the Straw Hats from his time in Arlong Park.

episodes.title: Shinkai de Sounan: Hagureta Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: Luffy, Zoro and Sanji are facing the Kraken.

episodes.title: Kaitei Kazan Funka! Nagasarete Gyojintou
episodes.plot: The Flying Dutchman shows up and Vander Decken tells Wadatsumi to crush the Thousand Sunny, but then the Kraken beats Wadatsumi.

episodes.title: Gyojintou Jouriku: Uruwashiki Ningyo-tachi
episodes.plot: The Straw Hat Pirates encounter Hammond, some sea-beasts and other fishmen from the New Fishman Pirates.

episodes.title: Koufun Bakuhatsu! Sanji Seimei no Kiki!
episodes.plot: Sanji playing in a pool with the mermaids in Mermaid Cove, Luffy, soaking his feet on the side of the pool, comments on how nice it must be to swim, Camie suggests that Luffy could wear a bubble in order to do so.

episodes.title: Gyojintou Metsubou!? Sharley no Yogen
episodes.plot: As blood donors are finally found, the recovering Sanji stays at the Mermaid Cafe while Luffy, Usopp and Camie meet Pappag and Brook.
